seo: 宏景eHR,任意文件读取,漏洞检测,高危
seo_en: Hongjing eHR, arbitrary file read, vulnerability detection, high risk
summary: 该插件用于检测宏景eHR系统的DisplayFiles功能是否存在任意文件读取漏洞，属于高危漏洞。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the DisplayFiles function of Hongjing eHR system has arbitrary file read vulnerability, which is a high-risk vulnerability.
